name: Shrobbery
description:
This game was made for the 3-Day Mini Jam 55: Stealth!

Download recommended! But the WebGL should be playable :D

Come join Special Agent Rattle Snek in pulling off the heist of the century.

Players will control Agent Russell, a cute little shrubby dude who can bypass any state-of-the-art security system due to his unassuming, leafy nature.  You must find a way to evade security lights, solve complex puzzles, and sneak past guards in order to complete the mission. With Russell's stealth and Rattle's wits, can this dynamic duo procure the greatest treasure of all time?

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Move Left: A, ← Left arrow
  • Move Right:  D, → Right arrow
  • Jump: W, ↑ Up arrow
  • Crouch: S, ↓ Down arrow
  • Restart: R
  • Mouse to click on buttons

Currently available on Windows and browser.

Please feel free to send us your comments to our Twitter!

This game was developed by VincentII and deBuggy.
